description: Add, remove, or replace artifact tags. If using the replacement_tags input, then tags_to_add and tags_to_remove will be ignored. All tag inputs should be comma-separated lists. Any whitespace before or after the tag will be stripped.

inputs.description: ID of the artifact to update
inputs.name: artifact_id

inputs.description: Comma-separated list of tags to add, which will be appended to the existing list.
inputs.name: tags_to_add

inputs.description: Comma-separated list of tags to remove. If the artifact does not have any of these tags, they will be ignored.
inputs.name: tags_to_remove

inputs.description: Comma-separated list of tags to apply to the artifact, which will replace all tags currently applied to the artifact.
inputs.name: replacement_tags
